languages.text: {n}Вас качает, как от болезни: все конечности кажутся невозможно хрупкими. Тонкие ноги, немощные руки — они вам не принадлежат. Это — костюм, и притом чужой, не подходящий вам по статусу и размеру, с жирными следами прежнего хозяина внутри. Хочется стянуть его с себя и выкинуть в сторону, как ношенную перчатку.{/n}

{n}You sway, as if from sickness, all your limbs feeling impossibly fragile. Scrawny legs, frail arms — these do not belong to you. This is a costume, and it is not yours: it does not fit your status, it is the wrong size, and it still carries greasy traces of its former owner inside. You are overcome with the urge to tear off your flesh and throw it away like a worn glove.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вас качает, как от болезни: все конечности кажутся невозможно хрупкими. Тонкие ноги, немощные руки — они вам не принадлежат. Это — костюм, и притом чужой, не подходящий вам по статусу и размеру, с жирными следами прежнего хозяина внутри. Хочется стянуть его с себя и выкинуть в сторону, как ношенную перчатку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You sway, as if from sickness, all your limbs feeling impossibly fragile. Scrawny legs, frail arms — these do not belong to you. This is a costume, and it is not yours: it does not fit your status, it is the wrong size, and it still carries greasy traces of its former owner inside. You are overcome with the urge to tear off your flesh and throw it away like a worn glove.{/n}

{n}You stagger as if suffering from disease, all your limbs feeling impossibly weak. Dirty nails, gaunt legs, a gut sticking to the ribs — they do not belong to you. This is a costume, and it is not yours: it does not fit your status, it is the wrong size, and it still carries greasy traces of its former owner inside. You are overcome with the urge to tear it all off and throw it away like a worn glove.{/n}

You are overcome with the urge to tear off your flesh and throw it away like a worn glove.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你摇摇晃晃，四肢虚弱不堪。你感觉双腿瘦弱，双臂无力——你的四肢并不属于你。这具躯体仿佛不合身的戏服一样，无论是尺寸还是身份都与你不符。这件戏服依然残留着肉体的痕迹，来自它的上一任主人。你心中的冲动呼唤着你，你渴望扯碎这具躯体，将它丢弃，就像扔掉一副破手套一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sway, as if from sickness, all your limbs feeling impossibly fragile. Scrawny legs, frail arms — these do not belong to you. This is a costume, and it is not yours: it does not fit your status, it is the wrong size, and it still carries greasy traces of its former owner inside. You are overcome with the urge to tear off your flesh and throw it away like a worn glove.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你摇摇晃晃，四肢虚弱不堪。你感觉双腿瘦弱，双臂无力——你的四肢并不属于你。这具躯体仿佛不合身的戏服一样，无论是尺寸还是身份都与你不符。这件戏服依然残留着肉体的痕迹，来自它的上一任主人。你心中的冲动呼唤着你，你渴望扯碎这具躯体，将它丢弃，就像扔掉一副破手套一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te tambaleas como si padecieras alguna enfermedad; todas tus extremidades parecen imposiblemente frágiles. Piernas delgaduchas, brazos endebles... nada de esto te pertenece. Es un disfraz, y no es tuyo: no es propio de tu estatus, no es tu talla y aún quedan restos grasientos de su anterior propietaria dentro. Sientes una apremiante necesidad de arrancarte la carne y descartarla como harías con un guante viejo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sway, as if from sickness, all your limbs feeling impossibly fragile. Scrawny legs, frail arms — these do not belong to you. This is a costume, and it is not yours: it does not fit your status, it is the wrong size, and it still carries greasy traces of its former owner inside. You are overcome with the urge to tear off your flesh and throw it away like a worn glove.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sanki bir hastalıktan muzdaripmişsin gibi sallanıyorsun, tüm uzuvların inanılmaz derecede kırılgan hissettiriyor. Zayıf kollar, çelimsiz bacaklar, kaburgalara yapışmış karın... Bunlar sana ait değil. Sana ait olmayan bir kostüm bu. Statüne uymuyor, hâlâ eski sahibinin yağlı izlerini içinde taşıyor. Etini yırtıp eski bir eldiven gibi fırlatıp atma dürtüsüne kapılıyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sway, as if from sickness, all your limbs feeling impossibly fragile. Scrawny legs, frail arms — these do not belong to you. This is a costume, and it is not yours: it does not fit your status, it is the wrong size, and it still carries greasy traces of its former owner inside. You are overcome with the urge to tear off your flesh and throw it away like a worn glove.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sanki bir hastalıktan muzdaripmişsin gibi sallanıyorsun, tüm uzuvların inanılmaz derecede kırılgan hissettiriyor. Zayıf kollar, çelimsiz bacaklar, kaburgalara yapışmış karın... Bunlar sana ait değil. Sana ait olmayan bir kostüm bu. Statüne uymuyor, hâlâ eski sahibinin yağlı izlerini içinde taşıyor. Etini yırtıp eski bir eldiven gibi fırlatıp atma dürtüsüne kapılıyorsun.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたはまるで病気に苦しむようにふらつき、全身はひどく弱っている。やつれた足、弱い手―これらはあなたのものではない。これは衣装であり、あなたのものではない。あなたの位に合っておらず、サイズも違い、前の持ち主の脂肪も付いている。あなたはその肉体をバラバラにしたい衝動を抑え、使いふるしたグローブのように捨て去る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sway, as if from sickness, all your limbs feeling impossibly fragile. Scrawny legs, frail arms — these do not belong to you. This is a costume, and it is not yours: it does not fit your status, it is the wrong size, and it still carries greasy traces of its former owner inside. You are overcome with the urge to tear off your flesh and throw it away like a worn glove.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたはまるで病気に苦しむようにふらつき、全身はひどく弱っている。汚い爪、やつれた足、空腹―これらはあなたのものではない。これは衣装であり、あなたのものではない。あなたの位に合っておらず、サイズも違い、前の持ち主の脂肪も付いている。あなたはその肉体をバラバラにしたい衝動を抑え、使いふるしたグローブのように捨て去る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous titubez. Tous vos membres sont incroyablement faibles, comme si vous souffriez d'une maladie. Ces jambes si maigres, ces bras décharnés... Rien de tout cela ne vous appartient. Ce costume n'est pas le vôtre : il ne correspond pas à votre statut, il n'est pas à la bonne taille et son intérieur est encore souillé par les traces graisseuses de la personne qui l'occupait auparavant. Vous vous retenez à grand-peine de ne pas arracher votre chair pour la jeter comme un gant usé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You sway, as if from sickness, all your limbs feeling impossibly fragile. Scrawny legs, frail arms — these do not belong to you. This is a costume, and it is not yours: it does not fit your status, it is the wrong size, and it still carries greasy traces of its former owner inside. You are overcome with the urge to tear off your flesh and throw it away like a worn glove.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous titubez. Tous vos membres sont incroyablement faibles, comme si vous souffriez d'une maladie. Ces jambes si maigres, ces bras décharnés... Rien de tout cela ne vous appartient. Ce costume n'est pas le vôtre : il ne correspond pas à votre statut, il n'est pas à la bonne taille et son intérieur est encore souillé par les traces graisseuses de la personne qui l'occupait auparavant. Vous vous retenez à grand-peine de ne pas arracher votre chair pour la jeter comme un gant usé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du taumelst wie krank, alle deine Gliedmaßen fühlen sich unfassbar zerbrechlich an. Dürre Beine, schwache Arme – sie gehören nicht dir. Das ist ein Kostüm, allerdings nicht das deine. Es passt nicht zu deinem Status, es hat die falsche Größe und trägt noch immer Spuren seiner einstigen Besitzerin in sich. Dich überkommt der Drang, dir das Fleisch vom Leib zu reißen und es wie einen alten Handschuh wegzuwerfen.{/n}
